actions.description: The lieutenant makes three Longsword or Javelin Launcher attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 20 (3d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: 8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target has the prone condition.
actions.name: Javelin Launcher

specialTraits.description: The lieutenant has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lieutenant's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.
specialTraits.name: Pack Tactics
